snippet: Bruce Nauman’s “One Hundred Fish Fountain,” at the Gagosian Gallery, features bronze casts of fish, hollow containers from which water spurts in slender streams through multiple perforations.
abstract: Ken Johnson reviews installation by Bruce Nauman at the Gagosian Gallery.
lead_paragraph: Bruce Nauman’s “One Hundred Fish Fountain,” at the Gagosian Gallery, features bronze casts of fish, hollow containers from which water spurts in slender streams through multiple perforations.
